news.title: New BigotiTech website
news.summary: We launch our new website with a renewed design, where you can discover all our projects and stay up to date with the latest news.

news.title: Rokub 10000 available
news.summary: Our dice game is now available. Challenge your luck and strategy in this reinvented classic for mobile devices.

news.title: Leporia in development
news.summary: We continue working on Leporia, our tool for evaluating financial portfolios. We will soon share more details about its progress.
